title: When will Riot add input buffering for spells on cooldown / dependencies?
body: Latency affects how quickly you can react to a situation, but it shouldn't cripple you by preventing you from using your abilities when they should be cast-able. 100ms of lag can add nearly 0.5 sec or 500ms to a full Ryze combo simply because the server has to check between each spell whether or not the previous spell has finish casting. That's gamebreaking. I makes so much more sense for Riot to implement server-side skill queueing instead of client-side skill queuing, like almost every other competitive online game.
